title: Rishi Sunak – 2021 Comments on Plan for Jobs
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 3 June 2021.
content:
Today’s data is another welcome sign that our Plan for Jobs is working and that the route we have taken is the right one.
